question: Calculate the length of Line_H_F_0.
qt_description: Line Line_H_F_0 (Description: Draw perpendicular from point H to line L1 (foot F_0 on extension))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 8-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 3, rotation angle 0 radians. Total 1 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'vertex_on_center' rule. Vertex-on-center derivation: 4-gon (center E) with radius equal to base 8-gon radius. Found 12 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 4 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 16, total arcs: 0, total points: 12.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Draw perpendicular from point H to line L1 (foot F_0 on extension)
api_results:
In the given geometric construction, a regular octagon centered at O1 with side length 3 is the base figure. A square centered at E, with radius equal to that of the octagon, is derived by placing one of its vertices at the center O1. Point H is a vertex of the octagon, and line L1 is the line passing through points D and F (vertices of the square). A perpendicular is drawn from point H to line L1, intersecting the extension of L1 at foot point F₀.

Calculate the length of segment HF₀.
